values:
<font size =1>.: I thought I'd lost you somewhere, but you were never really ever there at all :.

Sorry my lovelies, friends only <3 

If you want to be my "friend" either: A)Add me and comment so I know. B) Add me and don't say anything, eventually I will notice and say hi or something, you know, because I'm so nice.

_ex_oh
Ashlie
